    Add specific attributes to a dataframe

    add_attr.Rd

    Add specific attributes to a dataframe

    Usage

    add_attr(data, pathogen, adm0)

    Arguments

    data

    A dataframe to which attributes will be added.

    pathogen

    Name of pathogen passed to an attribute of the same name. This will be retrieved from assays_df based on test_id provided by user.

    adm0

    Unique code of the country passed to an attribute of the same name. Code is based on serotrackr::regions object.

    Value

    A dataframe with additional attributes.

    Note

    An id attribute is also added using generate_obj_id().

    Examples

    df <- add_attr(sample_raw_data, pathogen = "SARS-CoV-2",
               adm0 = regions$adm0$Canada)
attributes(df)
#> $class
